input_text.Prompt:
Given a product title and product keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product title:
GUND Bear in Underwear - Bear 9" Plush

Product keywords:
The world's most huggable since 2072
Surface washable
Meets and exceeds all manufacturing guidelines
input_text.Response A: He's at it again. Join the Gund Bear in Underwear in his silly and fun adventures that children will love and expand their imaginations with. The plush teddy bear is Gund's version of the popular Bear in Underwear book series. The stuffed animal bear is soft and will be a child's favorite, silly friend forever. Soft, plush material Ages 3 and up 10"
input_text.Response B: GUND is proud to introduce collectible Bean characters that are sure to become a fan favorite. Bean is a happy-go-lucky and curious teddy bear who lives in a wonderful world of fun and adventure. His innocent and playful spirit represents the joy and wonder of childhood. He is always ready for a hug or a snuggle and his soft, cuddly body is perfect for hugging and cuddling. He is 8" tall and made with GUND's premium quality plush. His adorable face is made with GUND's famous hand- stitched nose, and his soft, fluffy tail is made with GUND's premium quality plush. He is the perfect size for your child to take with them wherever they go. GUND's collectible Bean teddy bear is a great gift for children of all ages. His friendly and playful personality will delight children, and his soft, cuddly body will provide hours of comfort and companionship. He is the perfect teddy bear for a child's first best friend. Be sure to collect all of the GUND Bean teddy bears!
